resources.string: This is one of the many images on Haven.

Haven is a safe virtual space for people with anxiety disorders. Designed with the most common anxiety triggers in mind, it is a tool to distance oneself from the many upsetting and distressing things on the internet and on social media applications.
Below are a list of resources available for anyone in need of help:

Crisis Call Center
 800-273-8255 or text ANSWER to 839863 
 Available 24/7
 http://crisiscallcenter.org/crisis-services
 
 National Hopeline Network
 800-SUICIDE (784-2433)
 800-442-HOPE (4673)
 Available 24/7
 http://www.hopeline.com
